build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y ffmpeg imagemagick && mkdir -p /etc/ImageMagick-6 && echo '<policymap><policy domain="coder" rights="read|write" pattern="*" /><policy domain="resource" name="memory" value="256MiB" /><policy domain="resource" name="disk" value="1GiB" /></policymap>' > /etc/ImageMagick-6/policy.xml && pip install -r requirements.txt
